name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: A Journey Through Time and Space
summary: it's time! "Plants vs. Zombies 2 - A Journey Through Time and Space" has landed in China. The epic struggle between plants and zombies will continue in different time and space dimensions! New plants, new zombies, new gameplay, combined with the most advanced touch screen technology, players can break the traditional tower defense and directly join the zombie resistance war. With the return of Plants vs. Zombies 2, Crazy Dave, new touch screen super props, new magical plant energy, and new ways to protect your brain, come and join Crazy Dave in his crazy adventure through time and space! The previous game of "Plants vs. Zombies 2" is "Plants vs. Zombies" which has won more than 30 Game of the Year awards and has hundreds of millions of fans around the world.
